info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 11:36PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDonough County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adair, or 9 miles southeast of Macomb, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Philadelphia around 1150 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
